title: Community Garden Workshop
description: Learn organic gardening techniques and sustainable practices. Perfect for beginners and experienced gardeners alike.

title: Annual General Meeting
description: Join us for the AGM where we'll discuss community matters, review annual reports, and plan for the future.

title: Children's Fun Fair
description: A day of fun activities, games, and entertainment for children of all ages. Food stalls and prizes included.

title: Fitness Bootcamp
description: Free fitness sessions for all residents. Improve your health while having fun with neighbors.

title: Cultural Night
description: Celebrate the diversity of our community with performances, food, and cultural displays from various backgrounds.
